description:
PDF Protection and Digital Rights Management

Drumlin Publisher software enables you to convert your PDF files to our secure strongly encrypted format, with the permission settings you require. Files are converted locally, so the source PDFs never leave your site, only reference data is stored on our central Digital Rights Management (DRM) service. You can then distribute/sell the secured file(s) via emails, web download links or on physical media to your end users/customers/employees and our Digital Rights Management (DRM) service will check that the user is allowed to view that document via a system of authorization codes or licenses
